title: Cannot load this patch, Unspecified Error.
body: My client download will stay at 0% percent for a while until a message pops ups saying "An unspecified error has occured." I tried to reinstall and repair. Nothing has worked so far. Please help me!

replies.body: At this point in the process, your patcher is attempting to scan installation files but is being blocked by an OS setting or permissions issue.  Our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide should help you restore access to your patcher to scan and download as needed.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hey Porocles, I did everything in the guide, and then started up League. It is currently loading very slowly, but I believe it will get to 100%. If anything happens I will be sure to let you know, and thank you for your help
Glad it's working!  It may take some time for everything to scan and download, so be sure not to cancel it in the meantime.  Doing so could start the process all over again.  Hang tight!
Update: It was at 40%, then the Unspecified Error message came up again. I pressed retry and has started again at 33%. Its currently loading again.

Sounds like you might be having a series of different issues.  At 40%, the patcher is in the processing of downloading files, but connection issues with your network can result in that error.  With permissions issues potentially fixed, we can work on making sure your connection is in order.  If you receive an error again, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some troubleshoot steps.  Hopefully, this will get you all fixed up!
UPDATE: It has finally loaded, thanks to your connection issues guide! Thanks for all your help.

I called my provider, Comcast, and all they did for me was reset my "modem" which did not solve the problem.  I also do believe this is an internet issue. (I havent went through the guide yet, I am about to do it though.)
Update: It went to 82% (it also moved onto "updating league" step 2/2) then the unspecified message came up again.
